title: Public works projects: ineligible contractors and subcontractors.
subject: Publicworksprojects
ineligiblecontractorsandsubcontractors

abstracts.abstract:
Existing law prohibits a public entity from permitting an ineligible contractor or subcontractor to bid on, work on, or be awarded a public works project, and requires that every public works project contain a provision regarding this prohibition. Existing law declares that a contract entered into between a contractor and an ineligible subcontractor is void.

This bill would make nonsubstantive changes to those provisions.

extras.impact_clause: An act to amend Section 6109 of the Public Contract Code, relating to public contracts.
